trends: There has been one other sighting in Leesburg
There were no other sightings in Leesburg on or around August 20th 2013
Summary: heard jets fly over home, watched them, then noticed two other stationary objects above..after 3-5 mins one began to move slowly..one moved slowly, the other stayed stationary
divs: Sighting Detailsheard jets flying low, went outside to watch them. after 3-5 mins. we noticed two other objects slightly higher in the sky. one didnt seem to move at all, the other moved slowly to the south. then, as we watched, i looked through field binoculars for a sort time, one began to move up. it picked up seep as it did this. faster and faster it moved until it disappeared. the other object began to move off to the north, slowly.it seemed to leave eye view within a few mins. we live close to wright patterson airforce base, so we see jets a couple times a month. seemed strange that the jets and these objects were in the sky at the same time.the time would have been around 10:30pm. at first the objects in question seemed to be very bright stars.
